privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.intro: Implify AI respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our website and services.
privacy_policy.s1_text: We collect various types of information from you when you use our Services, including but not limited to: Personal Information (name, email, phone), Usage Data & Analytics, Message / Conversation Data, and Cookies & Tracking Data.
privacy_policy.s2_text: We use your data for purposes including: Providing and maintaining Services, processing payments, personalizing experience, communicating updates, and analyzing usage.
privacy_policy.s3_title: 3. Legal Basis (if applicable, especially under GDPR)
privacy_policy.s3_text: Where required, our legal basis may include your consent, performance of a contract, legitimate interests, or compliance with legal obligations.
privacy_policy.s4_text: We may share your data with service providers, affiliates, or law enforcement when required. We do not sell your personal data.
privacy_policy.s5_text: We retain your personal information only as long as necessary for the purposes set out above, or as required by law.
privacy_policy.s6_text: Depending on your jurisdiction, you may have rights to access, correct, delete, or restrict processing. Contact us at implifyai@gmail.com to exercise these rights.
privacy_policy.s7_text: You can choose to disable cookies via your browser settings, but that may affect functionality.
privacy_policy.s8_text: We will ensure appropriate safeguards are in place for cross-border data transfers.
privacy_policy.s9_text: We implement reasonable organizational, technical, and administrative measures to protect your data.
privacy_policy.s10_text: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We encourage you to check this page periodically.
